comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Anyone interested in planning a Fox/Hound game in the near future? Doesn't have to be this week, but sometime. (and I'm out Oct 8-14, so you'd better not plan something then, damn it).

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: It was one of those dreams: the kind that flickered to life as soon as his head hit the pillow. It was vivid and bright and achingly familiar. Phyllis Schlafly had just hung out the "Do Not Disturb" sign and was putting little umbrellas in the Mai Tais when the phone rang. It was Carruthers, the intern. "Mr. President, I hate to disturb your nap, but I knew you would want to know..." "Know _what?!!_ It's not that sniveler Paulson whining about the banks again, I hope." "No sir, it's..." "McCain? I've already promised him I'd lay low 'til the election. What's he after now, blood?" "No sir, it..." "Dick bag another scheister?" "No sir. This is much more important. _The gallery is back up on the Frenzy, sir._ It seems Steve Bail..." "Hot damn!" cried the Decider as he snapped upright from the couch. "This is great news, Carruthers! Get in here and turn my computer on for me, will you?" "Right away sir! Shall I bring you an Ovaltine to celebrate?" "Hell, yes! And cancel the reception for Gordon Brown tonight... I've got some catchin' up to do!" DU
